table.name: vtiger_ancustomers
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_ancustomers` ( `ancustomer_no` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `ancustomersid` int(11) NOT NULL, `name` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `account_id` int(19) DEFAULT NULL, `customershippingaddressid` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `customerprofileid` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `email` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `firstname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `lastname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `address` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `city` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `state` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `zip` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `country` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `phonenumber` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `faxnumber` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`ancustomersid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_ancustomerscf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_ancustomerscf` ( `ancustomersid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`ancustomersid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vte_modules
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vte_modules` ( `module` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `valid` int(1) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`module`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1

table.name: vtiger_ancustomers
table.sql: ALTER TABLE `vtiger_ancustomers` ADD INDEX `account_id_index` (`account_id`) USING BTREE ;
